abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to promote the
            integrated development of sericulture in India. Its main
            objectives would be: to increase raw silk production in
            Karnataka by 1,600 tons per year, including a significant
            increase in high quality silk; to introduce modern
            processing facilities and methods to upgrade raw and spun
            silk to export quality; and to introduce the latest
            technologies from leading silk producing countries and to
            expand local research for the longer term improvement of the
            silk industry.
